name: GravityDudes
description:
GravityDudes by Team Trio Mid (Irinel Cristea, Arin Luca, Alex Naiman)

Game made for Clujotronic Game Jam 2020.

This is a simple memory game. Your player is on a 4x4 grid map, each tile having a symbol on it. After a few seconds, the symbols disappear and a safe symbol is shown on the safe tile indicator. Move the character, using WASD, to a tile that showed the safe symbol and stay there until the level is finished.

For the best experience, play in fullscreen.

Thanks for playing :D
